title: Israelgogo
author: Israelgogo
content: How possible is it to start up and get started btc with a zero wallet account ,is it possible or is there a way to generate small profit without any from of money in wallet and zero account ,many companies claims to operate a zero robot account how possible is it ,isnt it audio money?.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: Israelgogo on May 17, 2022, 11:37:52 AMHow possible is it to start up and get started btc with a zero wallet account ,is it possible or is there a way to generate small profit without any from of money in wallet and zero account ,many companies claims to operate a zero robot account how possible is it ,isnt it audio money?.Can you give an answer to opening a new fiat bank account without making a deposit and have funds into such account? obviously no. so don't be entice by the flattery words of ssome cryptopreneurs because they only want to get your attention to scam you, they will rather take from that you have rather than giving to add to it, nothing is free even in Freetown hope you know that, and always consider everything you do in crypto as part of taking risk.

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: Are you talking about not having money or not wanting to risk any? Either way, you could start looking at faucets and other ways to make small amounts of money to invest (but they might not be/feel that worthwhile). Most giveaways large crypto companies do normally expect a deposit so those might be a bad starting point but maybe something to look into in case there are some that give a few $ just for signing up.It's probably better off to start in crypto without investing anything as you're less likely to fall for scams and can also learn about what you're actually doing before/if you invest more.

comments.author: DdmrDdmr
comments.body: Quote from: Israelgogo on May 17, 2022, 11:37:52 AM<…>Honestly, I can´t really understand what you are asking, besides seemingly querying about getting BTC on some sort of wallet for doing nothing. That reminds me of some sites that more or less lead you to believing you are earning free BTC, but then when you want to retrieve the funds, oh surprise, you’re asked to send them some BTC in order to be able to withdraw, with one pretext or another. Obviously you eventually end up not being able to withdraw (aka scam).In any case, it may be better if you provide an example of what companies you are talking about. Note that, if you provide a link to a site, since it may be of a dubious nature, it may be best to make sure it’s not clickable (i.e. place it inside a BBS code structure, or replace the dots and colons for something else).

comments.author: Findingnemo
comments.body: Yes, you can get few cents worth of BTC for free while registering on exchanges but for that you have to complete KYC while popular exchange needs first deposit for the register bonus to get deposit, if you keep it zero and it will be zero all the time.However money isn't free, you have to work and get the money or else your money has to work which will generate more money the same thing applies to Bitcoin as well.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: Israelgogo on May 17, 2022, 11:37:52 AMHow possible is it to start up and get started btc with a zero wallet account ,is it possible or is there a way to generate small profit without any from of money in wallet and zero account ,many companies claims to operate a zero robot account how possible is it ,isnt it audio money?.I don't what exactly is zero wallet or zero robot account?  You don't need permission from any company to have bitcoin wallet, all you have to do is download open source software like Electrum.Generate seed words, backup them up in safe place, and than you can use multiple addresses for receiving and sending your coins.This is not like bank or exchange account, so you can have unlimited number of addresses without any coins on them.

comments.author: witcher_sense
comments.body: Quote from: Israelgogo on May 17, 2022, 11:37:52 AMHow possible is it to start up and get started btc with a zero wallet account ,is it possible or is there a way to generate small profit without any from of money in wallet and zero account ,many companies claims to operate a zero robot account how possible is it ,isnt it audio money?.As saying goes: "the mouse dies in the trap because it doesn’t understand why the cheese is free."  Bitcoin is not "audio money," it is sound money or hard money, which means it cannot be printed up for free with a stroke of a pen, or a flick of a switch: you require to put some effort, invest your time to obtain it. In fact, you will have two options for how to acquire a desirable asset. You either earn it directly from investing in mining hardware or indirectly, which will involve economic interactions with other people making offers in bitcoin. Even if you find a resource that offers something "for free," you will still, at best, be exchanging your precious time and effort for this almost free, rotten cheese. Do not fall victim to mousetrap like that, train your skills instead and learn how to transform honest work and time into something equally valuable.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: Quote from: Israelgogo on May 17, 2022, 11:37:52 AMHow possible is it to start up and get started btc with a zero wallet account ,is it possible or is there a way to generate small profit without any from of money in wallet and zero account ,many companies claims to operate a zero robot account how possible is it ,isnt it audio money?.Where have you heard that 'zero robots'? That sounds new to me or it's just another term of those people that have said it to you or that you've read for the term bot in trading. Well, actually, it's possible to really earn even if you don't have capital but you have to remember that nothing comes free now in the market unless you're willing to trade for something and it's like trading your service for crypto. And once you're all set and you have money now, that's where you're going to start either in trading or investing.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Israelgogo on May 17, 2022, 11:37:52 AMHow possible is it to start up and get started btc with a zero wallet account ~I think you should try phrasing your question differently. You use some expressions that are not common in this area. You mentioned "zero wallet account", "zero robot account", "audio money", ... What is that exactly? Bitcoin is not "audio money" but electronic money or digital money. One of the easiest ways to get bitcoins into your wallet is to buy them at one of the online exchanges. Just like buying foreign currency, you exchange your fiat currency for bitcoin.
